description: Autonomous server backup for migration to new VPS

userStories.title: Run migration readiness check
userStories.description: Verify the server is ready for backup by checking all prerequisites
acceptanceCriteria: All checks pass (Docker, OpenClaw, disk space, required tools)

userStories.title: Create complete server backup
userStories.description: Run full-server-backup.sh to backup everything (OpenClaw, shared folders, Git repos, security configs)
acceptanceCriteria: Both encrypted and unencrypted archives created
Document backup location and size in progress.txt

userStories.title: Verify backup integrity
userStories.description: Verify the backup was created correctly with valid checksums
acceptanceCriteria: Verify checksums.txt file exists and is valid
Run sha256sum verification on backup archives

userStories.title: Document backup contents
userStories.description: Create detailed inventory of what was backed up for reference
acceptanceCriteria: List all backed up components (Docker, shared folders, SSH keys, etc.)
Document backup size and file counts
Create BACKUP-INVENTORY.md in project root with full details
Include what API keys and security items are in backup

userStories.title: Prepare new server setup instructions
userStories.description: Create step-by-step guide for setting up the new server
acceptanceCriteria: Include commands to transfer backup files
List new server IP placeholder for user to fill in

userStories.title: Create transfer commands script
userStories.description: Prepare ready-to-run commands for transferring backup to new server
acceptanceCriteria: Include scp command for encrypted backup
Include scp commands for migration scripts
Include rsync alternative for large files

userStories.title: Generate final migration checklist
userStories.description: Create comprehensive checklist of all remaining manual steps
acceptanceCriteria: List remaining manual steps with checkboxes
Include estimated time for each step
